# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# NOTE: This was NOT automatically generated by the oomph_generate_cmake_script
# script, as it cannot handle conditional statements.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16..3.20 FATAL_ERROR)
project(unstructured_adaptive_3d_ALE C CXX Fortran)
find_package(oomphlib REQUIRED)
enable_testing()

if(OOMPH_HAS_CGAL)
  oomph_add_executable(
    NAME uns_adapt_3d
    SOURCES uns_adapt_3d.cc
    LIBRARIES oomph::solid oomph::constitutive oomph::navier_stokes
    CXX_STANDARD 11)
endif()

# ---------------------------------- TESTING ----------------------------------

set(TEST_TARGET_DEPS)

if(OOMPH_HAS_CGAL)
  list(APPEND TEST_TARGET_DEPS uns_adapt_3d)
endif()

oomph_add_test(
  TEST_NAME navier_stokes.unstructured_adaptive_3d_ALE
  TARGET_DEPENDENCIES ${TEST_TARGET_DEPS}
  EXTRA_REQUIRES
  LABELS "navier_stokes;unstructured_adaptive_3d_ALE;adapt")

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
